section.title: Filter Design, Quantization Noise, and Oversampling
section.para: The Acquisition Board aims for a 10 kHz bandwidth with a 16-bit signal resolution. Here we discuss filter design and sampling decisions, and how discretization of time and quantization of amplitude impact overall system performance.
